text: Indira Anne Varma (born 27 September 1973) is a British actress. She is known for playing Niobe in the BBC and HBO series Rome (2005–07), Suzie Costello in the BBC series Torchwood (2006), Zoe Luther in the BBC series Luther (2010), Ilsa Pucci in Human Target (2010–11), and Ellaria Sand in the HBO series Game of Thrones (2014–2017). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Living people Category:1973 births Category:Actors from Somerset Category:British movie actors Category:British voice actors Category:British television actors Category:British stage actors Category:People from Bath, Somerset
title: Indira Varma
